shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity
Class PathMeasure

java.lang.Object
  shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.SimilarityMeasure
      shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.PathMeasure
Direct Known Subclasses:
ICMeasure
public abstract class PathMeasure
extends SimilarityMeasure

An abstract class that addes path based methods to the top level similarity measure class but doesn't itself define a similarity measure.

Author:
Mark A. Greenwood

useSingleRoot

protected boolean useSingleRoot()
Should we use a siingle root node for each POS tag hierarchy

Returns:
true if we should use a single root node for each POS tag, false otherwise

Description copied from class: SimilarityMeasure
Configures the similarity measure using the supplied parameters.

Specified by:
config in class SimilarityMeasure
Parameters:
params - a set of key-value pairs that are used to configure the similarity measure. See concrete implementations for details of expected/possible parameters.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while configuring the similarity measure.

Utility method to determine if the list of nodes contains a given synset

Returns:
